member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowItemRequest
member.summary: The AddWorkflowItemRequest class is a REST data model representing a request to add a workflow item for moderation.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowItemRequest.Workflow
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the workflow with which this item is associated.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowItemRequest.State
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of this item within the associated workflow.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowItemRequest.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the reference identifying the entity under moderation.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowItemRequest.Extension
member.summary: Gets or sets the workflow item extension data.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowItemRequest.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets the transition session token associated with the workflow item.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowRequest
member.summary: The AddWorkflowRequest class is a REST data model representing a request to add a workflow for moderation.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowRequest.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name for this workflow.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowRequest.Transitions
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of transitions comprising this workflow. Transitions describe the action require to move from one state to another within the workflow.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowRequest.InitialState
member.summary: Gets or sets the start state for this workflow.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.AddWorkflowRequest.Extension
member.summary: Gets or sets the workflow extension data.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.BeginTransitionSessionRequest
member.summary: The BeginTransitionSessionRequest class is a REST data model representing a request to begin a workflow item moderation session.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.BeginTransitionSessionRequest.Workflow
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the workflow to begin a moderation session on.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.BeginTransitionSessionRequest.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the target of the item that will be moderated during the workflow session.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest
member.summary: The GetWorkflowItemByCriteriaRequest class is a REST data model representing a criteria by which workflow items should be filtered for retrieval.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.Workflow
member.summary: Gets or sets a workflow ID filtering the result set to only items associated with that workflow.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.State
member.summary: Gets or sets the workflow state to which items should be restricted.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets a reference representing the item target within the workflow to which items should be restricted.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.ExcludeHistoricalItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether or not the result set should be only include items representing the current state of resources within a workflow.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset at which the filtered results should be returned.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the number of matching workflows to returned.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.Sort
member.summary: Gets or sets the sort rules for the filtered set.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.ExtensionType
member.summary: Gets or sets the extension type to filter on.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.ExtensionFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets the extension filter.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.IncludeSubclasses
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to include subclasses during the filtering.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowItemsByCriteriaRequest.CalculateTotalCount
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to calculate total count or not.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Rest.Contracts.GetWorkflowsByCriteriaRequest

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the number of matching workflows to returned.

member.summary: Gets or sets the sort rules for the filtered set.

member.summary: Gets or sets the extension type to filter on.

member.summary: Gets or sets the extension filter.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether to include subclasses during the filtering.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether to calculate total count or not.

Identifies the target to which access was granted

member.summary: Gets or sets the Id for this workflow.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name for this workflow.
